name: John Smith
said: Easy to work with! Purchased a used iPhone that Joe fixed up. Reasonable rates and he set up the whole thing for me in a short amount of time! I highly recommend to visit them.

said: Quick and flawless. The back of my iPhone 12 Pro was broken and they made it look like the the original phone. They know a lot about mobile phones and the repair process.
